data.eml:eml: Phlegmariurus vanuatuensis (Huperzioideae, Lycopodiaceae) a new species from Vanuatu, re-circumscription of P. nummulariifolius and new combinations in Phlegmariurus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Field, Ashley Raymond (2018): Phlegmariurus vanuatuensis (Huperzioideae, Lycopodiaceae) a new species from Vanuatu, re-circumscription of P. nummulariifolius and new combinations in Phlegmariurus. PhytoKeys 109: 53-66, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.109.29359, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.109.29359
